alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 30 at 12:38PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River at Hailey affecting Blaine County. .Warm temperatures will melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Big Wood River at Hailey. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.7 feet, or 1199 cfs... Near bankfull from Ketchum down-river to Glendale Road Bridge south of Bellevue. Some lowland seepage and ponding is possible in residential areas near the river especially in the Della View subdivision on far western War Eagle Drive. Gimlet subdivision may experience ponding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM MDT Friday, May 27 the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 3.9 feet Sunday, May 29. It will then rise to 3.9 feet early Saturday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Action stage is 3.7 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Wood River Hailey 5.0 3.7 Fri 8 am MDT 3.9 3.8 3.8 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
